subject: p14969719
History: Increasing pain and shortness of breath after thoracoscopy.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to obtained at 4:59 pm. There is slight interval increase in the apical collection of the fluid that potentially might reflect accumulation of pleural effusion versus bleeding. The rest of the findings are unchanged. There is no pneumothorax.
